introduction: Ten years after WWII, Blagoje Jovović lives in Buenos Aires, where he is running a cork factory with his friend Jakov. Everything is going well, they have just concluded a deal that will change their lives, and Blagoje is planning a wedding with a local girl, when one day, he notices a man with an Ustasha symbol tattoo in a crowd. (Ushtashas were fascist military forces of the Croation Independent State). Aware that a notorious Ustasha leader lives in Buenos Aires, Blagoje comes up with the idea of eliminating him.
